Html:
Kudos to all who contributed to this project. Its highly useable and very fast.

Is there any plan to include a mesh simplification algorithm in the library ?

I didn't have a lot of time working on this project lately and there are no plans to include new features.

Could you explain what you mean by mesh simplification. If it's about some operations like edge flipping/collapsing it shouldn't be hard to implement. Your best bet would be to use the latest source code (beta 4), turn the mesh into a DCEL and then operate on the half-edges.
